rukus.text: 30|11|Allahe'i srstira sucana karae, tara pichata teraemi iyara punaraabrtti karaiba, tara pichata tomalokaka te'omra ocarate'i pratyarartana karaoraa ha’ba.
30|12|Arau yidina kiyamata sanghatita ha’ba se'idina aparaadhibilaka hatasa hai paraiba.
30|13|Arau (allahara lagata karaa) sihamtara sbaraikasakala sihamtara babe chuparaichakarai nahaba arau sihamte sihamtara sbaraikakrta upasyaborara asbikarakarai ha’ba.
30|14|Arau yidina kiyamata sanghatita ha’ba se'idina sihamta bibhakta hai paraiba.
30|15|Eteke yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche te'omloke jannatata sukha-santita thakiba
30|16|arau yisakale kupharai karaiche lagate amara ayatasamuha arau akhiraatara saksataka asbikara karaiche, parainamata sihamtaka sastira majata upasthita karaa ha’ba.
30|17|Eteke tomaloke allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa, yetiya tomaloke sandhata upanita horaa arau poraa sajaga horaa
30|18|abeli arau yetiya tomaloke dupuraiyata upanita horaa. Te'omra babe'i sakalo prasansa akasasamuhata arau prthiraita.

30|19|Teraemi nirjirara paraa sajira uliya'i ane arau teraemi jiraitara paraa mrtaka uliya'i ane. Arau teraemi bhumika tara mrtyura pichata akau punarjiraita karae. E'idarae'i tomalokako uliya'i ana ha’ba.
